hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions about our services or want to schedule a consultation? Our team is available to help you design the garden of your dreams.

contactMethods.title: Contact Methods
contactMethods.description: Choose the most convenient way to reach our team of garden experts

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Have questions or concerns? Contact us anytime. Our team is available to help transform your outdoor space into the dream garden you've always wanted.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of professional garden and landscaping services to meet all your outdoor needs.

lawnCare.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
lawnCare.description: Regular mowing, fertilizing, aeration, and weed control to keep your lawn healthy and vibrant all year round.

gardenDesign.title: Garden Design
gardenDesign.description: Custom garden designs that reflect your style and meet your needs, from modern minimalist to lush traditional.

planting.title: Planting Services
planting.description: Expert selection and installation of trees, shrubs, flowers, and other plants suitable for your local climate.

irrigation.title: Irrigation Systems
irrigation.description: Planning and installation of efficient irrigation systems to ensure your garden is optimally watered.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.description: With over 15 years of experience in the industry, we take pride in delivering exceptional service and results.

experiencedTeam.title: Experienced Team
experiencedTeam.description: Our team of qualified professionals has years of experience in garden and landscape construction.

qualityMaterials.title: Quality Materials
qualityMaterials.description: We use only the highest quality plants, materials, and equipment for all our projects.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: We develop tailored solutions that meet your specific needs and preferences.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfaction.description: We're not satisfied until you're completely happy with the results of our work.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services, processes, and policies.

items.question: What areas do you service?
items.answer: We currently offer our garden and landscaping services throughout Green City and within a 50-kilometer radius.

items.question: Do you offer free consultations?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free initial consultation to discuss your garden needs and provide a general estimate for your project.

items.question: How far in advance should I book your services?
items.answer: For regular maintenance work, a 1-2 week lead time is usually sufficient. For larger landscaping projects, we recommend booking 3-4 weeks in advance, especially during the peak spring and summer seasons.

items.question: Do you offer garden maintenance plans?
items.answer: We offer customized maintenance plans tailored to your garden's specific needs, with options for weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly maintenance.

schedule.title: Ready to Transform Your Outdoor Space?
schedule.description: Schedule a consultation with our expert team and take the first step toward creating the garden of your dreams.
